description: Try our easy to follow Grilled Chicken With Smashed Avo On Toast recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Grilled Chicken With Smashed Avo On Toast
name: Grilled Chicken With Smashed Avo On Toast Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Scoop avocado flesh into a bowl. Using a fork, roughly mash. Stir in lemon juice and season to taste. Top toast with avocado, rocket, chicken, pesto and tomato. Serve.
